name: Giant Scorpion

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The scorpion makes two attacks: one with its pincers and one with its sting.

actions.name: Pincers
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

other_info: The giant scorpion is a deadly creature that lurks in the desert, using its powerful pincers and venomous sting to take down its prey.
